definition: a swimming stroke in which the arms are thrown forward together out of the water while the feet kick up and down, to talk or behave amorously, without serious intentions
details:
noun
- a swimming stroke in which the arms are thrown forward together out of the water while the feet kick up and down
= synonyms: butterfly stroke
- diurnal insect typically having a slender body with knobbed antennae and broad colorful wings
verb
- to talk or behave amorously, without serious intentions
= example: to talk or behave amorously, without serious intentions
= synonyms: flirt
- to cut and spread open, as in preparation for cooking
= example: to cut and spread open, as in preparation for cooking
- to flutter like a butterfly
= example: to flutter like a butterfly
